title: Greate Brittaines noble and worthy councell of warr
publisher: Printed for Thomas Archer in Popes head Ally, and are to be sold at this shop in Popes head Ally, ouer against the si[ne?] of the Horse-shoe,
notes: Place and date from STC (2nd ed.).
